Class Config

  • java.lang.Object
    • space.gameressence.atiburcio.tyler.util.Config
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Config
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Config class contains methods to facilitate the creation and loading of java properties files CHANGELOG: Added toString, getName methods
    Version:
    2
    Author:
    Tyler Atiburcio
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
